content:
From: Jeremy Sylvestre <jsylvest@ualberta.ca>
Will the Isabelle2021 version of the VS Code extension be published to the
Marketplace?

From: Jeremy Sylvestre <jsylvest@ualberta.ca>
Thanks! Odd that searching for it in the Marketplace last night didn't
bring up any results.

From: Jeremy Sylvestre <jsylvest@ualberta.ca>
Any chance you would consider also publishing the VS Code extension on Open
VSX?
https://open-vsx.org/

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Yes, maybe at a later stage, e.g. for the Isabelle2021-1 release (December 2021).

After some years of inactivity around Isabelle/VSCode, it will again become
more active in the coming months.

Makarius
